thread.title: A youthful reshuffle for the Saudi economy and military

title: A youthful reshuffle for the Saudi economy and military
text:
A youthful reshuffle for the Saudi economy and military 4:43pm GMT - 01:06 
Saudi Arabia's King Salman reshuffled top military officers and several deputy ministers on Monday in a move seen as elevating younger officials to senior positions. David Doyle reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Saudi Arabia's King Salman reshuffled top military officers and several deputy ministers on Monday in a move seen as elevating younger officials to senior positions. David Doyle reports.
